verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: blasted] [ARG1: drugmakers and healthcare ' middlemen '] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARG2: for making prescription medicines unaffordable for Americans] .
President Donald Trump blasted [ARG0: drugmakers and healthcare ' middlemen '] on Friday for [V: making] [ARG1: prescription medicines unaffordable for Americans] .
